"Симуляторные" прицелы для топового сетапа СССР: Т-80У, Т-72Б3 и Т-80Б.
Так же добавлены 2 версии прицела для Т-80У с уменьшенной толщиной линий и уменьшенной длиной штрихов дальности: совсем толкие линии (на 2.7х их не видно, но зато идеально в 12х) и средние, как по мне, оптимальные. Симуляторная версия только для средних линий, но кто разбирается, может в пару кликов уменьшить толщину линий.

Так же для среднего прицела изменено положение поля вывода информации о дальности, т.к. в стандартной версии оно слишком близко к краю экрана и в режиме тепловизора не всегда видно зн...

Универсальный, простой прицел для любой техники (танков).
#Universal #Универсальный #Sight #Прицел
Добавлены изменения:
1.Размер цифр увеличен с "0.8" до "1".
2.Добавлены дополнительные риски "4" и "12"на горизонтальной шкале.

A sight for the ZTZ-96 and the ZTZ-96A, based off a picture from a blog. There are three (two currently) versions of the sight, one base sight, another with 2 additional lines, as it was hard to tell, from the picture taken, how the sight exactly looks like.
To use the sight you need to:
1. Get into a test drive with any vehicle.
2. Press the escape button and navigate your way to "Options".
3. Click on "Default grid sight" in Common Battle Settings and then click "Add a grid sight". This will create the folder "all_tanks". You can delete the new g...

Sight for the ZTZ-96/96A99 based on the sight from the ZTZ 98 from Battlefield 2!

I can't find any info on what the irl sight is for this vehicle, so i decided to go with a bit of nostalgia for this one :b

3rd picture shows more info on this sight

I do not have the ZTZ-96 so i based the sight on the T-72B sinse both use the same scope stats SO PLZ IF THE SIGHTS DOES NOT WORK LET ME KNOW

there are 4 versions, versions with and without the rangefinder and a static or movable version for each (the sight moves down when you adjust like soviet sights or static where...

A universal sight for all vehicles, this is my first sight. It serves as an easy template for sights with a penetration table and sight info box, I have some of those made already so I may post them if people ask.

Made by Shadiez

Simple fixed sight for T80U

Paste UserSights folder to \steamapps\common\War Thunder\

Check out youtube.com/Shadiezbabiez and twitch.tv/Shadiez for more

Youtube videos for how to install:
https://youtu.be/sqMi6qg2BBA

Made by Shadiez for Tank Biathlon Event

Check out youtube.com/Shadiezbabiez and twitch.tv/Shadiez for more

Aim on the move using the line target on the left and on main range use right ranges.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hUyDcHPOsNw

User sight for the Germany MBT. (2A4, 2A5)

can use DM33, DM23, DM13.

Except for the vertical zero, everything else does not move.

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight for OTOMATIC

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #otomatic #otomagic

This is a fully fictional sight package for the Italian OTOMATIC SPAAG, including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for ammo (APFSDS or HE-MOM & APFSDS), up to 6'400 meters
- Ranging funnels for APFSDS, configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)
- Deflection shooting aim crosses for APFSDS, for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer)

I included two variants: Scolia01 contains scales for both HE-MOM and

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight package for Russian WW2 76mm weapons

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #76mm #su_5_1 #su_76m #t_26_4 #t_28 #t_28e #smk #t_35 #matilda_mk2 #t_34 #t_34_76 #t_34_1940 #t_34_1941 #t_34_1942 #t_34e #t_34e_smk #bt_7_f32

This is a fully fictional sight package for Russian 76mm canon armed tanks (USSR, China, Finland Germany) of World War 2, including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo
- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)
- Deflection shooting aim crosses

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #105mm #m47_105 #of40 #of40_mk2 #of40_mtca #centauro #centauro_romor #shot_kal_dalet #magach3 #m48a2_g_a2 #m48_super #leopard_1 #leopard_a1a1 #radkampfwagen_90 #tam #merkava_mk1 #merkava_mk2b #m60 #m60a1_aos #m60a1_rise_p #m60a3_tts #xm1_gm #xm1_chrysler #m1_abrams #ipm1 #rooikat_105 #stb_1 #type_74 #type_74g #type_16 #cm11 #strv_101 #strv_103_0 #strv_103a #strv_103c #cv_90105_tml #centurion_mk10 #vickers_mbt

This is a fully fictional sight package for 105mm canon armed tanks (USA, Italy

The "Chads, Circular, Universal, Minimal, Multi, Sight" or CCUMMS for short. I basically used a similar sight as Minedeployer universal [All credit to him] but has 2 circles that help a ton for very fast 500 to 1k adjustments for Dart guns firing 1500 m/s and above or is great for 250-500ish meter adjustment shots with older AP tanks like Tiger or 76mm US.

I also hate vertical line because it obstructs vision for micro-adjustments.

This sight is great for unzoomed MBTs because the circles show your general aim posture while not being stick at the 10x zoom. This makes 3x driving while FPS i
